description.en: Rich and creamy imported butter, ensuring a melt-in-your-mouth texture.
description.zh: 浓郁柔滑的进口黄油，确保入口即化的口感。

description.en: Unbleached, high-protein flour for the perfect pastry structure.
description.zh: 未经漂白的高筋面粉，打造完美的糕点结构。

description.en: Sustainably sourced dark chocolate with deep cocoa notes for our signature ganache.
description.zh: 可持续来源的黑巧克力，带有深沉的可可风味，用于我们的招牌甘那许。

description.en: Farm-fresh, free-range eggs that lend our sponge cakes a signature golden hue and airy fluffiness.
description.zh: 农场新鲜的散养鸡蛋，为我们的海绵蛋糕带来招牌的金黄色泽和轻盈蓬松感。
阳光下成熟的当地水果。

description.en: Crafted without any artificial preservatives, ensuring every bite stays true to its natural, wholesome flavors.
description.zh: 不含任何人工防腐剂，确保每一口都保持天然、健康的原始风味。
